title: Jamie Carragher: I was shaking my head in disbelief when I heard this about Chelsea
text:
1 of 12 David Luiz sparked wild celebrations with his goal against Liverpool last night Luiz, after all, is not a defender in the uncompromising mould of Leonardo Bonucci or Giorgio Chiellini Jamie Carragher 
And with Carragher sceptical of Luiz’s previous bad traits, he couldn’t believe Conte had gambled on the 29-year-old instead of going after one of his trusted Italians. 
“As last summer's transfer window closed in August, I could not stop shaking my head in disbelief as the biggest story of the day unfolded,” the former Liverpool defender told the Daily Mail. 
“David Luiz back to Chelsea? Seriously? Even though there was TV footage of him walking through St Pancras station after his Eurostar had arrived from Paris, I couldn't work out why this reunion was taking place. GETTY Antonio Conte toko a gamble on bringing David Luiz back to Chelsea from PSG last summer GETTY David Luiz has silenced his critics with some impressive performances this season 
“For that reason I had doubts about whether Antonio Conte actually wanted him. Luiz, after all, is not a defender in the uncompromising mould of Leonardo Bonucci or Giorgio Chiellini.” 
Luiz, who scored for the Blues last time out in their 1-1 draw with Liverpool, will be hoping to add to his tally when Chelsea host Arsenal tomorrow (12.30pm). Related articles
